description: Boxed lunches located in Quebec (see Annex A)

# Tender Announcement

**Procurement Title:** RFP-WS3954769898 – Packaged Combination Meals  
** enn:**RFP-WS3954769898 – Repas complets sous emballage – Québec

**Reference Number:** WS3954769898-Doc4136385583

**Contracting Agency:** 
- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSC)
- Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux du Canada (MTSPGDC)

**Procurement Information**
------------------------------------

- **Publication Date:** August 8, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** September 6, 2023 | 14:00:00 HAE
- **Contract Duration:** May 31, 2024 (Prentific expected contract start date: None, expected contract end date)

**Procurement Description:**
We are seeking a supplier to provide packaged combination meals. The procurement will be conducted as a request for standing offer (RFSO) using the Competitive-Open Bidding method. 

**Goods or Services Required:**
Packaged combination meals for military personnel in Quebec.

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

**Expected Selection Method:**
The procurement will be awarded based on lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:**

- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (ALECP)
- Comprehensive and ProgressifTrans-pacific Partnership (PTPGP)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Trade 
- World Trade Trade (WTP) of Government chases Purchase fastsicip 

**Regions of Opportunities:**

- None

**Regions for Delivery:**
- Quebec (except the National Capital Region)

**Representation of Respondents:**
The selection process will be conducted in accordance with the Canadian free trade agreement (ALEC) and other Canadian trade agreements.
